channel.title: Excel on Rsquared Academy Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Excel on Rsquared Academy Blog

item.title: Import Data into R - Part 2
item.description: Introduction This is the fourth post in the series Introduction to tidyverse. In the previous post, we learnt how to read data from delimited files and other statistical softwares. In this post we will learn to: list sheets in an excel file read data from excel sheet read specific cells from an excel sheet read a single row read a single column read several rows read several columns
